page.title: 02Mrs. Kimber Remembers
page.content: Mrs Kimber is an eighty-two year old lady who lives in Cromhall.She remembers a lot about her childhood , especialy about school .The boys and girls would bowl their wooden hoops along the road to school .They would have their hands and shoes inspected. Once Mrs Kimber was caned. She had been playing down at Fiddler's Bottom and had'nt heard the bell go and was late back to school. It was only a light tap though.They had fifteen minutes for playtime and had to say grace before meals.The girls did sewing and mending, while the boys looked after a small garden.She remembered enjoying Empire day at school when all the children sang Rule Brittania.The Inspector came once a year to look at their books.The children used to get butterflies on that occasion.
